apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji illustrates a loving couple, composed of a man with medium skin tone and a woman with medium-light skin tone, their bond visually strengthened by a bright, glossy heart. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and realistic lighting give the heart a palpable sense of joy and unity. On Apple devices, this design conveys a strong romantic relationship, partnership, and shared happiness, presented with the characteristic warmth and polish of Apple's emoji collection.
